summary: A comprehensive bugfixing mod for The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim - Hearthfire
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=red][size=6]This file is no longer supported.[/size][/color][/center]
[center][color=red][size=6]Please refer to the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214]Legendary Edition[/url] patch instead.[/size][/color][/center]

A comprehensive bugfixing mod for The Elder Scrolls V: Hearthfire, the goal of the Unofficial Hearthfire Patch (aka UHFP) is to eventually fix every bug with Hearthfire not officially resolved by the developers to the limits of the Creation Kit and community-developed tools, in one easy-to-install package.

Features:
- Hundreds of gameplay, quest, NPC, object, item, text and placement bugs fixed.
- Created by the authors of the Unofficial Oblivion Patch series.
- No unsafe changes (such as deletions of stock objects).
- Designed to be compatible with as many other mods as possible.

For more information (ie the recent changelog, mods that the UHFP replaces) see [url=https://afkmods.iguanadons.net/index.php?/forum/345-unofficial-skyrim-patches/]the USKP's threads on the AFK Mods forum here[/url].

[url=https://afkmods.iguanadons.net/Unofficial%20Hearthfire%20Patch%20Version%20History.html]The complete changelog is posted here[/url].

If you're experiencing a bug with Hearthfire, please report the bug to us in as much detail as possible on the bugtracker]. Please use search to ensure that you aren't submitting something that is already there.

[url=https://afkmods.iguanadons.net/index.php?/topic/3580-frequently-asked-questions-bugs/]Frequently Asked Questions - BUGS[/url]
[url=https://afkmods.iguanadons.net/index.php?/topic/3581-frequently-asked-questions-about-the-project/]Frequently Asked Questions - About the Project[/url]
[url=https://afkmods.iguanadons.net/index.php?/topic/3636-mods-made-obsolete-by-unofficial-patches/]Mods Made Obsolete by Unofficial Patches[/url]
[url=https://afkmods.iguanadons.net/index.php?/topic/3999-bug-fixes-recommended-in-addition-to-the-unofficial-patches/]Bug Fixes Recommended in Addition to the Unofficial Patches[/url]
[url=http://forums.steampowered.com/forums/showthread.php?t=2963860]List of known conflicts and fixes for Hearthfire[/url]. Good info for when you're having problems and need to locate a potentially conflicting mod.

[b][u][size=4]Installation Requirements[/size][/u][/b]

Official Skyrim patch 1.9.32.0.8 or greater.
Official Hearthfire DLC.

[b][u][size=4]Complementary Mods[/size][/u][/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url] - Fixes numerous bugs in the vanilla game.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23491]Unofficial Dawnguard Patch[/url] - Fixes numerous bugs in the official Dawnguard DLC.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31083/]Unofficial Dragonborn Patch[/url] - Fixes numerous bugs in the official Dragonborn DLC.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31255]Unofficial High Resolution Patch[/url] - Fixes several bugs in the official Hi-Res DLC.

After installing the individual mods, the following general load order needs to be followed:

Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
Unofficial Skyrim Patch.esp
Dawnguard.esm
Unofficial Dawnguard Patch.esp
Hearthfires.esm
Unofficial Hearthfire Patch.esp
Dragonborn.esm
Unofficial Dragonborn Patch.esp
[Your other ESM files]
HighResTexturePack01.esp
HighResTexturePack02.esp
HighResTexturePack03.esp
Unofficial High Resolution Patch.esp
[The rest of your mods]

For getting load order set with other mods loaded, please use [url=https://loot.github.io/]LOOT[/url]. It will provide you a solid starting point for everything that you can then tweak as needed.

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/hXQSy.png[/img][/url][/center]

[b][u]Errors During NMM Installation[/u][/b]

If you get the following error:

BOSS_API_ERROR_INVALID_ARGS: Master files must load before other plugins. The mod was not installed.

You need to perform the following steps:

- Uninstall and delete all the Unofficial patches in NMM.
- Exit NMM.
- Launch NMM again.
- Download and install all of the updated Unofficial Patches.
- Run LOOT to sort your load order.

[b][u]Cannot Absorb Dragon Souls[/u][/b]

[u]Make sure your load order is right![/u]

Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
USKP
Dawnguard.esm
UDGP
Hearthfires.esm
UHFP
Dragonborn.esm
UDBP
[Other ESMs]
Official hi-res DLC
UHRP
[Other ESPs]

Use LOOT - you'll enjoy life more.

[u]Loose Scripts in DataScripts[/u]

Check for: dragonactorscript.pex and/or mqkilldragonscript.pex. Remove them if present. They are from dragon mods that came as loose files.

DSAMG - Dragon Soul Absorb More Glorious, and Diversified Dragons are known to cause this. Those mods need to be updated with a Dragonborn patch that incorporates the fixes from the UDBP.

Others may be a factor as well.

Note too that the offending mod may have the script packaged inside a BSA. That will need to be handled by that mod's author.

[center][url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/554570]Witanlore: Dreamtime - An RPG of Grizzly Proportions![/url][/center]
[center][img]https://www.iguanadons.net/DreamtimeSigBar.jpg[/img][/center]
author: Unofficial Patch Project Team
